p: As explants for A. hololeuca and H. angustifolius, seeds obtained from the nursery of rare and endangered plant species of the Rostov region of the SFU botanical garden were used. For both species, seeds were sterilized with several substances and solutions in different sequences and with different exposure times. For primary surface sterilization, running water with the addition of a drop of Tween-20 was used. The HgCl 2 solutions of 0.1%, C 2H 5OH 96%, a mixture of 70% C 2H 5OH + 3% H 2O 2 solution (1:1) were used for further cleaning of explants from infection. Before the inoculation, the seeds were washed in distilled water.
